Docs.summary: Determines the type of operation that the user was performing when the **Cancel** button was clicked in a item.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ListViewCancelMode enumeration is used to represent the type of operation that the user was performing when the **Cancel** button was clicked in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> item. (A Cancel button is a button whose `CommandName` property set to "Cancel".)
## Examples The following example shows how to use the ListViewCancelMode enumeration to check which operation is being canceled in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> item.
[!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_138_1.aspx)] [!code-cs[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_138_1.aspx)]
